About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Full Stack Web Developer, Cyber security & Penetration Tester. Interested in Front End Developing. I love learning and being challenged on a daily basis. I have always enjoyed the challenge of being able to identify faults and work to resolve them. Also, throughout my life, I have grown with the idea of setting high goals and working hard to achieve and surpass the goals. Encouraged by this passion and following this approach my objective is to be seen as someone with deep expertise in the field of web developing. I love playing football, and photography has always been one of my favorite hobbies.
